attributes.action: Abandon the ban on the use of cluster munitions by British Military Forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Ban has only been agreed to for the sake of political correctness,the fact is these munitions save the lives of british soldiers every day. Its time that these decisions were made by those who they effect, and the government listen to MOD.How many of those who made this decision have even fought in a war?
besides the ban is flawed british forward air controllers can just call in american air support, who are authorised to drop cluster munitions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
